timeline.message: Restored a reference to the file used to test file uploads

timeline.bodyText: I think for this one, we'll need to keep the change to use 12.x and 1.6.0 for the dependencies.
timeline.author: wing328
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -20,9 +20,9 @@
   <ItemGroup>
     <PackageReference Include="FubarCoder.RestSharp.Portable.Core" Version="4.0.7" />
     <PackageReference Include="FubarCoder.RestSharp.Portable.HttpClient" Version="4.0.7" />
-    <PackageReference Include="Newtonsoft.Json" Version="12.0.3" />
-    <PackageReference Include="JsonSubTypes" Version="1.6.0" />
+    <PackageReference Include="Newtonsoft.Json" Version="10.0.3" />
+    <PackageReference Include="JsonSubTypes" Version="1.2.0" />

replies.bodyText: I'l do it with a separate PR.
replies.author: wing328
